description: New user requests and modifications of user access to critical systems and applications are performed by submitting an approved access request form to the security administrator.  Access requests require approval from the user's appropriate manager.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C09) Authorization is ended upon receipt of a termination notice from HR
description: Authorization is removed upon receipt of a termination notice from the department supervisor, on an as needed basis.  All access rights are removed at that time, appropriate passwords are changed, and where necessary accounts removed.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C10) Unique User ID's and passwords
description: Access to critical systems and applications require unique user ID's and passwords.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C11) Password Security Settings
description: Password security settings for critical systems (operating systems) and applications require at least 8 character passwords and 90 day aging.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C12) User access rights are reviewed
description: User access rights for all critical systems and applications are reviewed for appropriateness at least once a year by the Organization or cluster Director of Finance.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C13) Centralized administrative accounts are reviewed annually for  Active Directory
description: IT management reviews all administrative accounts for Netware and Windows annually.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C14) Admin accounts are distributed to expedite admin of the Netware or Windows environment
description: IT management permits a limited set of administrative accounts to authorized administrative personnel to expedite administration of the Network environment.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C15) Access to the network is restricted through network devices
description: Where the Organization has a direct connection to the Internet, access to Organization's network is restricted through firewalls, routers, DMZ, and VPN according to the network topology diagram. Guest Network data is not commingled with corporate data.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C16) External card readers restrict access to production floor
description: Where the Organization hosts its own financial application, access to the property computer room is restricted through external card readers and is limited to appropriate IT and Organization security personnel.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C17) Approval of access requests to production floor
description: Where the Organization hosts its own financial application, authorization of card access to the production floor requires approval from IT management.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C18) Review of access to production floor
description: Where the Organization hosts its own financial application, the IT manager responsible for the Organization performs a review of access to the production floor on an annual basis.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C19) Environmental control systems are in place
description: Environmental control systems are in place, protecting against fire, excessive heat, humidity and water flow.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C20) Deployment of Virus Protection
description: Virus protection technology is employed on Organization computers.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C21) Security incidents are handled by the security administrator
description: Security incidents are documented and reported to the GM or the IT manager responsible for the Organization.  Critical security incidents are immediately reported to appropriate management.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C22)  Financial spreadsheets are backed up daily
description: All critical financial spreadsheets, including any templates used to upload data from the PMS to the financial system (e.g., Peoplesoft, Navision, Sun, Hyperion, etc.) are filed on network servers that are part of the nightly backups and the related process

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C23) Access requests require approved request forms
description: Access to all critical financial spreadsheets is controlled as part of the user administration process for the department, including appropriate manager approval of new access, modified access, and removal of terminated users.

question: Do you keep a form / record for (C24) Data integrity is protected within financial spreadsheets
description: Formulas and calculation methods used in critical financial spreadsheets are reviewed quarterly by Management to verify the integrity of spreadsheet results.
